trans-unit.source: Armageddon
trans-unit.target: Armageddon

trans-unit.source: Destroy all lands.
trans-unit.target: Destroy all lands.

trans-unit.source: A bloody dawn broke over a scabbed and tortured world.
trans-unit.target: A bloody dawn broke over a scabbed and tortured world.

trans-unit.resname: V14·2 | Burning of Xinye | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Burning of Xinye
trans-unit.target: Burning of Xinye

trans-unit.resname: V14·2 | Burning of Xinye | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You destroy four lands you control, then target opponent destroys four lands he or she controls. Then CARDNAME deals 4 damage to each creature.
trans-unit.target: You destroy four lands you control, then target opponent destroys four lands he or she controls. Then CARDNAME deals 4 damage to each creature.

trans-unit.source: Cataclysm
trans-unit.target: Cataclysm

trans-unit.source: Each player chooses from among the permanents he or she controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.
trans-unit.target: Each player chooses from among the permanents he or she controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.

trans-unit.source: "Keep with you only this much: your mount, your blade, and your wits. The rest you can find, build, or take."\n—Horse clans' wisdom
trans-unit.target: "Keep with you only this much: your mount, your blade, and your wits. The rest you can find, build, or take."\n—Horse clans' wisdom

trans-unit.resname: V14·4 | Child of Alara | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Child of Alara
trans-unit.target: Child of Alara

trans-unit.resname: V14·4 | Child of Alara | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: Trample

trans-unit.resname: V14·4 | Child of Alara | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, destroy all nonland permanents. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME dies, destroy all nonland permanents. They can't be regenerated.

trans-unit.resname: V14·4 | Child of Alara | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The progeny of the Maelstrom shows no allegiance—and no mercy—to any of the five shards.
trans-unit.target: The progeny of the Maelstrom shows no allegiance—and no mercy—to any of the five shards.

trans-unit.resname: V14·5 | Decree of Annihilation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Decree of Annihilation
trans-unit.target: Decree of Annihilation

trans-unit.resname: V14·5 | Decree of Annihilation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile all artifacts, creatures, and lands from the battlefield, all cards from all graveyards, and all cards from all hands.
trans-unit.target: Exile all artifacts, creatures, and lands from the battlefield, all cards from all graveyards, and all cards from all hands.

trans-unit.resname: V14·5 | Decree of Annihilation | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cycling {5}{R}{R} ({5}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: Cycling {5}{R}{R} ({5}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

trans-unit.resname: V14·5 | Decree of Annihilation | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When you cycle CARDNAME, destroy all lands.
trans-unit.target: When you cycle CARDNAME, destroy all lands.

trans-unit.source: Firespout
trans-unit.target: Firespout

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast CARDNAME and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast it. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast CARDNAME and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast it. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)

trans-unit.source: Fracturing Gust
trans-unit.target: Fracturing Gust

trans-unit.resname: V14·7 | Fracturing Gust | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. You gain 2 life for each permanent destroyed this way.
trans-unit.target: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. You gain 2 life for each permanent destroyed this way.

trans-unit.source: Elvish dawnhands test a relic's worthiness before collecting it for the safehold. If it can't stand up to a stiff breeze, it's left behind.
trans-unit.target: Elvish dawnhands test a relic's worthiness before collecting it for the safehold. If it can't stand up to a stiff breeze, it's left behind.

trans-unit.source: Living Death
trans-unit.target: Living Death

trans-unit.resname: V14·8 | Living Death | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Martial Coup
trans-unit.target: Martial Coup

trans-unit.resname: V14·9 | Martial Coup | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.
trans-unit.target: Put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.

trans-unit.source: Their war forgotten, the nations of Bant stood united in the face of a common threat.
trans-unit.target: Their war forgotten, the nations of Bant stood united in the face of a common threat.

trans-unit.source: Rolling Earthquake
trans-unit.target: Rolling Earthquake

trans-unit.resname: V14·10 | Rolling Earthquake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to each creature without horsemanship and each player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals X damage to each creature without horsemanship and each player.

trans-unit.source: Smokestack
trans-unit.target: Smokestack

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a soot counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a soot counter on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a permanent for each soot counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a permanent for each soot counter on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.source: Terminus
trans-unit.target: Terminus

trans-unit.source: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
trans-unit.target: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.

trans-unit.source: Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
trans-unit.target: Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

trans-unit.source: Upheaval
trans-unit.target: Upheaval

trans-unit.source: Return all permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: Return all permanents to their owners' hands.

trans-unit.source: The calm comes after the storm.
trans-unit.target: The calm comes after the storm.

trans-unit.source: Virtue's Ruin
trans-unit.target: Virtue's Ruin

trans-unit.resname: V14·14 | Virtue's Ruin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all white creatures.
trans-unit.target: Destroy all white creatures.

trans-unit.source: All must fall, and those who stand highest fall hardest.
trans-unit.target: All must fall, and those who stand highest fall hardest.

trans-unit.resname: V14·15 | Wrath of God | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wrath of God
trans-unit.target: Wrath of God

trans-unit.resname: V14·15 | Wrath of God | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

trans-unit.resname: V14·15 | Wrath of God | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Legend speaks of the lost coastal polis of Olantin, whose inhabitants' hubris enraged the sun god Heliod.
trans-unit.target: Legend speaks of the lost coastal polis of Olantin, whose inhabitants' hubris enraged the sun god Heliod.
